title: Registration for 2025-2026 Season is Open
excerpt: Wrestling will start December 1st, 2025. Please contact us if you have any questions about the upcoming season.

title: Ben Peterson Clinic Was a Huge Success
excerpt: A big thank you to Olympic champion Ben Peterson for visiting and sharing his expertise with our young wrestlers.

title: Support the Matdogs: Become a Sponsor
excerpt: We are an official non-profit organization and all donations are tax deductible. Click here to learn more about sponsoring.
